title: Subpart 374-1 - Standards for the Management of Specific Hazardous Wastes and Specific Types of Hazardous Waste Management Facilities
content:
Subpart 374-1 - Standards for the Management of Specific Hazardous Wastes and Specific Types of Hazardous Waste Management Facilities

State Regulations
§ 374-1.1 - General
§ 374-1.3 - Recyclable materials used in a manner constituting disposal
§ 374-1.6 - Recyclable materials utilized for precious metal recovery
§ 374-1.7 - Spent lead-acid batteries being reclaimed
§ 374-1.8 - Hazardous waste burned in boilers and industrial furnaces
§ 374-1.9 - Conditional exemption low-level mixed waste storage, treatment, transportation and disposal
§ 374-1.13 - Military munitions

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
